meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.2.0.Beta1 released!
meta.summary:
The first beta of the upcoming Vert.x 4.2 has just been released. We
  consider it feature complete and invite the community to test it.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.1.3 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 4.1.3 has just been released. It fixes quite a few bugs that have been reported by the community and provides a couple of features

meta.title: Dynamic database pool configuration with Vert.x SQL Client
meta.summary: You will learn how to achieve dynamic database configuration of the Vert.x SQL Client pool

meta.title: Things to keep in mind concerning CSRF attacks
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x like most frameworks provides an anti-CSRF defense. However, no framework can prevent all attack vectors that exist in the web. Therefore, developers need to be aware of some dangers and common attack vectors concerning CSRF defenses.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4 beta 3 released!
meta.summary: The third beta version of Eclipse Vert.x 4.0 highlights many features including (but not limited to) HTTP client request creation, HTTP tunnel improvements, and WebSocket upgrade improvements.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.2.0.CR1 released!
meta.summary:
The first candidate release of the upcoming Vert.x 4.2 has just been released. We
  consider it feature complete and invite the community to test it.
